modName: Holy SweetGFX - ENB Graphics for SweetFX
summary: Holy SweetGFX is a SweetFX configuration designed with Low-Med hardware in mind, that is to say it will simulate the very appearance of ENB, just minus the whole FPS drain.
descriptionHtml:
Holy SweetGFX is a heavily customized, and optimized SweetFX configuration which aims to mimic the appearance of a professionally-designed ENB setting.

Holy SweetGFX is built upon Version 1.4 of SweetFX, and with the amount of time I spent on this I believe its safe to say the is the best possible result with ver 1.4. I'm currently working on designing a setup using the latest 1.5.1 which includes some extra shader effects.

This mod was initially designed to be used with MyGoodEye's and Gopher's IMAGINATOR, but revision 2 does not require it.

For the darkened lighting please get the Enhanced Lighting and Effects mod http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?
author: Zovio
